entry.title: Segfault Compiler Hackathon Finalist
entry.content:
I'm thrilled to share that our project, a custom MLIR dialect for debugging and instrumenting IRs generated by compiler passes, was selected as a finalist at Segfault Compiler Hackathon! ðŸš€

This dialect makes it easier to observe and analyze transformations across different stages of the MLIR pipeline, helping developers better understand and debug their conversions/transformations.

It was an incredible experience to showcase this work and exchange ideas with the community.

ðŸ‘‰ You can explore the project here: Arey Dialect

entry.title: Presented at PLDI 2025 SRC and Received PLMW Scholarship
entry.content:
I'm excited to share that I presented my work at the PLDI 2025 Student Research Competition (SRC)!
My extended abstract was published in the PLDI 2025 proceedings, and I had a wonderful opportunity to engage with researchers in programming languages and systems.

ðŸŽ‰ I was also honored to receive the PLMW (Programming Languages Mentoring Workshop) scholarship.

You can check out my slides here:
